tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE luxury_home_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    buyer_name VARCHAR,
    buyer_email VARCHAR,
    seller_name VARCHAR,
    seller_email VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_homes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bedrooms INT,
    bathrooms INT,
    available BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    buyer_id INT,
    seller_id INT,
    property_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_homes (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	address TEXT NOT NULL,
	price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
	type TEXT,
	size INT
);

CREATE TABLE buyers (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name TEXT NOT NULL,
	email TEXT UNIQUE,
	phone TEXT,
	budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_id INT REFERENCES luxury_homes(id),
	buyer_id INT REFERENCES buyers(id),
	transaction_date DATE,
	amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    home_id INT,
    seller_id INT,
    buyer_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_homes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL,
    bedrooms INT,
    bathrooms INT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    home_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    expiration_date DATE,
    cvv VARCHAR(3) 
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    home_id INT,
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE
);
